title: Novel failure of automagic IO in PY3?!
body:
I switched to using PY3 as default interpreter for my manual datalad use. I found this failure that is new to me. There is a bug in search (also), because it is retrieving metadata blobs, after the search is completed on a search index that was build from those blobs (impossible situation), but the rest is wrong too.

```
% datalad -f '{metadata.dicom.Series.SoftwareVersions}' search 'yx11*'
[INFO   ] Query completed in 0.019776070999796502 sec. Reporting up to 20 top matches. 
[INFO   ] AutomagicIO: retrieving file content of /tmp/cbbs/.datalad/metadata/objects/c6/cn-7157eaf044d0accf2d4eab735c57fa.xz 
[INFO   ] AutomagicIO: retrieving file content of /tmp/cbbs/.datalad/metadata/objects/6b/cn-0703be2f4e11c5e7601b718de60832.xz                                                                                                                             
[INFO   ] AutomagicIO: retrieving file content of /tmp/cbbs/.datalad/metadata/objects/f4/cn-76c7f4b0a4970e65b44eaa9c8bfed4.xz                                                                                                                             
[INFO   ] AutomagicIO: retrieving file content of /tmp/cbbs/.datalad/metadata/objects/67/cn-b9c0b92a94f43e59e922242ae3fd57.xz                                                                                                                             
[INFO   ] AutomagicIO: retrieving file content of /tmp/cbbs/.datalad/metadata/objects/e8/cn-03ef9c78f0bcaa2f25000e91937747.xz                                                                                                                             
[INFO   ] AutomagicIO: retrieving file content of /tmp/cbbs/.datalad/metadata/objects/00/cn-0c5233f5de8ed73b76c91d97ee006a.xz                                                                                                                             
Exception ignored in: <bound method AnnexRepo.__del__ of <AnnexRepo path=/tmp/cbbs (<class 'datalad.support.annexrepo.AnnexRepo'>)>>                                                                                                                      
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/support/annexrepo.py", line 311, in __del__
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/support/annexrepo.py", line 3257, in close
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/support/annexrepo.py", line 3402, in close
  File "/home/mih/env/datalad3-dev/lib/python3.6/os.py", line 1016, in fdopen
ImportError: sys.meta_path is None, Python is likely shutting down
Exception ignored in: <bound method BatchedAnnexes.__del__ of {"info:annex_options:['--bytes']:json:True:path:/tmp/cbbs:git_options:['-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0']:annex_cmd:info": BatchedAnnex(annex_cmd=['info'], annex_options=['--bytes', '--json'], git_options=<<['-c', 'receive.autogc...>>, output_proc=<function>, path='/tmp/cbbs')}>
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/support/annexrepo.py", line 3260, in __del__
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/support/annexrepo.py", line 3257, in close
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/support/annexrepo.py", line 3402, in close
  File "/home/mih/env/datalad3-dev/lib/python3.6/os.py", line 1016, in fdopen
ImportError: sys.meta_path is None, Python is likely shutting down
Exception ignored in: <bound method BatchedAnnex.__del__ of BatchedAnnex(annex_cmd=['info'], annex_options=['--bytes', '--json'], git_options=<<['-c', 'receive.autogc...>>, output_proc=<function>, path='/tmp/cbbs')>
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/support/annexrepo.py", line 3396, in __del__
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/support/annexrepo.py", line 3402, in close
  File "/home/mih/env/datalad3-dev/lib/python3.6/os.py", line 1016, in fdopen
ImportError: sys.meta_path is None, Python is likely shutting down
datalad -f '{metadata.dicom.Series.SoftwareVersions}' search 'yx11*'  4.66s user 0.77s system 55% cpu 9.804 total
```
